data.name: Auth.Login.Failed.Detail
data.value: The email/username or password is incorrect.

data.name: Auth.Login.LockedOut.Detail
data.value: Your account is temporarily locked due to too many failed attempts. Please try again later or reset your password.

data.name: Auth.Login.EmailNotVerified.Detail
data.value: Please verify your email address before signing in. If you didn't receive the email, you can request a new verification link.

data.name: Auth.Login.Unavailable.Detail
data.value: Sign-in is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.

data.name: Auth.Reset.InvalidLink.Detail
data.value: This password reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one.

data.name: Auth.Reset.Forgot.Generic
data.value: If an account exists for this email, youâ€™ll receive a password reset link shortly.

data.name: Auth.Activation.InvalidLink.Detail
data.value: This verification link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one.

data.name: Auth.RateLimit.TooManyAttempts.Detail
data.value: Too many attempts. Please try again later.

data.name: Common.Validation.InvalidRequest
data.value: One or more validation errors occurred.

data.name: Common.Validation.CheckInput
data.value: Please check the submitted values and try again.

data.name: Common.Error.Detail
data.value: The operation could not be completed.

data.name: Oidc.Token.RefreshReused
data.value: The refresh token has already been used.

data.name: Oidc.Scope.OpenId.Description
data.value: Authenticate you and share your subject identifier.

data.name: Oidc.Scope.Email.Description
data.value: Access your email address and verification status.

data.name: Oidc.Scope.OfflineAccess.Description
data.value: Keep access using refresh tokens when you are offline.

data.name: Oidc.Scope.Api.Description
data.value: Call protected API endpoints on your behalf.

data.name: Oidc.Scope.Generic.Description
data.value: Allows the application to access this scope.
